record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1923. Sixth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fifth row: F. K. Gowdy, H. E. Barnes, J. E. Russell, and R. S. Atwood; fourth row: T. Eck, V. Levine, J. S. Masek, J. M. Pyott, G. Harvey, F. Caruso, and N. B. Johnson; third row: E. V. Kennan, W. Kennedy, C. Dickson, E. Lampe, and H.G. Frieda; second row: E. E. Krogh (captain), A. Jones, and C. J. Brickman; first row: S. Bisno, R. B. MacFarlane, W. E. Bates, H. P. Bourke, and N. K. Stitt.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
